channel.title: Presenting the Ladies of Throne of Lies - What class next?

item.title: Presenting the Ladies of Throne of Lies - What class next?
item.dc:creator: cupcakeaj2
item.description:
My Necromancer can be a Lady.

Class-Necromancer

Neutral Killing

Passive-Soulless-You are immune to death once.

Passive-Unfair Acts-“Death Bet” won’t count if you killed them yourself.

Day Ability-Death Bet-Bet on 3 players to die. You will gain one soul for each of the 3 players that die the next night. Unlimited use.

Night Ability-Soul Surge-Spend souls to kill the same amount of players. Example-You spend two souls to kill two players.

Goal-Kill everyone that doesn’t need to survive.

Read full topic
item.source: Presenting the Ladies of Throne of Lies - What class next?

item.title: Presenting the Ladies of Throne of Lies - What class next?
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Icibalus:

I want the Scorned to be a lady for teh lolz.

basic anatomy says females can’t get scorned.

Icibalus:

And yes I want the portrait immediately updated to reflect this change.

AAUSP: allies against updating the scorned portrait.

item.title: Presenting the Ladies of Throne of Lies - What class next?
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
He is right we probably shouldn’t have done it. In my opinion it is fine to do so on clearly memey/jokey/off-topic threads if it is clearly a funny misquote, but should not be overly used on normal threads.

Read full topic

item.source: Presenting the Ladies of Throne of Lies - What class next?

item.title: Presenting the Ladies of Throne of Lies - What class next?
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
I did slightly dis-rail this thread my apologies. I think it should only be allowed in off-topic and only if it is obvious you are just mucking around (ie clearly a misquote for humour), not genuinely trying to slander someone.

e.g All are misquotes here are obviously jokes, but should probably still not be allowed anywhere other than off-topic or jokey threads.

Read full topic
